section.title: Technology dependencies
section.para:
GridShib depends on the following GT components:
Authorization Framework

Other third party dependencies:
Globus SAML Library
GridShib depends on a special version of OpenSAML 1.1. The GridShib Project forked OpenSAML in January 2006, added some features and unit tests, and bundled the package as globus-opensaml-1.1.jar. This JAR is not versioned (though maybe it should be) since we don't support its use outside of GridShib.
